item.title: VSTECS MS ESD Order Applet
item.description: Attached User guide for MS ESD Order and Work Breakdown for implementation. This Applet required integration from BLG to EMP & BLG to Distributor’s system to function correctly. API to check MS ESD Product SKU updated price. API to create an order to retrieve MS ESD product from distributors. **Note There is 2 workflow for this integration currently: Shortcut method : EMP integration to BLG (without T2T Admin Applet) Standard method : T2T admin applet to enable guest and host tenant connectivity , Doc-item-maintenance applet to do the item code mapping.
